data.system_settings: Samsung Galaxy S7 edge (SM-G935F), Android Nougat 7.0
data.actual_result: Selected options/ pressed buttons are invisible
data.expected_result: All options/buttons should be visible just like in dark mode
data.short_description: Selected options are invisible when editing a new server's icon in light mode
data.steps_to_repro: - Go to Settings > Appearance and enable light mode - Scroll all the way down to the bottom in the channel list, press the plus icon and choose to create a new server - Tap the server's icon, upload an image and wait for the editor to load - Notice how "Original" and the Cropping icon are invisible and any option you select becomes invisible
